actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide Federal grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach moral and ethical principles.

summary.text: Authorizes the Commissioner of Education to make grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach moral and ethical princples. Authorizes to be appropriated $5,000,000 for fiscal year 1972, and for each of the two succeeding years, to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide Federal grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach moral and ethical principles.
